section.title: Workflow Activities
section.para: Workflow activities are generated based on your workflow configuration. From the activities list, you can both view your activities and take action on them. To view your current workflow activities, go to System > Workflow Activities.
To edit an activity, right-click on the activity and choose the Edit Activity option. The following screen will appear:
When editing a workflow activity, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the module the workflow is configured for.
Displays the standard action defined in the workflow configuration.
Displays a brief statement summarizing the purpose of the workflow.
Specifies the activity's level of importance.
Specifies the sequence order of the activity.
Identifies the owner of the activity.
Identifies the person the activity is assigned to.
Identifies the current status of the activity.
Dates are used to define when a subsequent step must begin.
Dates are used to define when a subsequent step must be completed.
Enter the date the activity should take place.
Enter the date the activity is completed.
This is an open text field for additional notes relating to the activity.

section.para: To view the next steps for the workflow once the activity is completed and has passed or finished any requirements.

listitem.para: The next steps once the workflow is completed.

section.para: You are able to view the next steps for the workflow once it has been determined that it has failed or has not successfully been completed.

listitem.para: The next steps once the workflow is deferred.
